name: RegSense
postCreateCommand: pip install uv && uv sync && cd frontend && npm install

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: API key for OpenRouter (required for LLM classification)

LANGFUSE_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Langfuse public key (optional — enables agent tracing)

LANGFUSE_SECRET_KEY.description: Langfuse secret key (optional — enables agent tracing)

LANGFUSE_BASE_URL.description: Langfuse endpoint URL (optional — defaults to https://cloud.langfuse.com)
